Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Miki
Reviews.Content: First off, it's a great phone for the price you pay. It's as good as any other $250+ phones. The phones runs smooth with quite a few apps which surprises me. I got the phone with a 2GB sd card so that helped a great deal.Pros:- Cost effective, works without data plan thanks to wifi, decent audio output.Cons-1)poor battery life - if you use wifi or gps for a while then it'll drain the battery.2)not enough internal memory. it has preloaded apps on phone memory which consume most of the space. it's about 200MB I guess.3)2MP cam. Well it's not much of a con but for the same price, u get quite a few phones with >2mp cams.This makes a good first smartphone if you didn't get one yet. It pretty much serves the purpose without shelling out big bucks.

Reviews.Title: Meets all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Diego Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The product meets my expectations, the price is low, the functions provided are sufficient for what I need, I recommend to people who need a practical and affordable mobile

Reviews.Title: Great Little Phone
Reviews.Author: RW
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these phones. One for my Wife, and one for me. Phone is great little phone. (I say little, because the screen is 3") and compared to other Samsung Galaxy phones, 3" screen is little.But we have had these phones for about a month now, and they have worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Love my phone! Wish could rate 5 star but have a reason
Reviews.Author: Ayka
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung Galaxy as much as I could love iPhone because it has everything the iPhone could do.Considering the differences in the prizes I prefer Samsung Galaxy to iPhone. PROS:-The phone is very light, thin and small that makes it easy to hold.-Menu is very easy to use.You can download appl. yourself without any instructions-All social networks,Facebook,Youtube,Twitter & Skype works well enough & I got notifications on my phone even few seconds before than my computer. Skype call works perfect. However, I didn't check video call yet.-Navigator works superb! I checked phone navigator & Tom Tom navigator at the same time,phone reacts quicker.CONS:-doesn't keep charge when use applications,like after 2-3 hours needs recharge.I'd rate 4 out of 5 because of battery.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: aragua11
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, exceeded all my expectations, good size, unlocked, 3G 900/2100, works great. From Venezuela recommend. Grab all operators. Fine

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Rose Gov
Reviews.Content: I just got this phone a few days ago. It appears to be brand new and was unlocked. I just popped in my sim card and it worked right away. I connected the internet using wifi and then with my service provider. I experienced no difficulty on that end.Like other earlier reviewers commented, the keyboard is a bit small and I often press the wrong keys. But all in all, so far I LOVE the phone - it is compact, light, fits in my purse or pocket quite comfortably, and easy to use. I also like that it came with a 4g sd card.P.S. I would like it ti be updated to play Candy Crush Saga.

Reviews.Title: no too good deal
Reviews.Author: Alexus
Reviews.Content: This phone comes with a cheap adaptador for the European version charger and the cellphone has not a earphones included, if you do not speak English the only others two languages are oriental...

Reviews.Title: ME ENCANTAD
Reviews.Author: legnay
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE TIENDA LOS RECOMIENDO Y MUY BIEN EL PRODUCTO LLEGO A TIEMPO Y BIEN EMBALADO JUSTO LO QUE PEDI LOS RECOMIENDO

Reviews.Title: phone for the road not for the people like to use phone like small computer
Reviews.Author: J Sa
Reviews.Content: great phone little difficult to work initially and battery do not last longer, but the reception and applicability are great and it is unblock for me it is great I travel a lot oversea

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Francisca O.
Reviews.Content: phone arrived on time and works perfect no hassle getting it to work.the only problem is that it is too small n I was expecting something bigger.either than that,this  is goooood.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Sanchez
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I expected. Nothing more or less. As usual the battery does'nt last long, even though Im not a 24/7 user of the phone. Android is fine and the apps, the gps its great.And I dont like very much the 2mp cam, but thats what you get for a low price. Its a good price for the phone..

Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is my first smartphone and it has been a very good phone.  I only wish that I had ordered a phone with a larger display, but other than that, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Galazy cel phone
Reviews.Author: Conrad Simmonds
Reviews.Content: I have received it in good time and it has been working very good  for now.as it is still new I cant elaborate on it too much.

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: Sheree C
Reviews.Content: It is limited in data space even with the sd card. It is attractive enough as it looks just like the larger examples of Samsung galaxies. If you want a small phone this is it. While yes it is unlocked... it can only be used with companies that use sim cards. ATT, t mobile, walmart for example. This phone can not be used on cricket or any other GSM carrier.

Reviews.Title: Too Small
Reviews.Author: Bubba
Reviews.Content: This phone was too small to see anything and it kept dropping the calls in Costa Rica. The cheaper one I bought was better at reception. I bought this hoping to use the smart part but it was hard to see the print.

Reviews.Title: need headphones white
Reviews.Author: Arnold
Reviews.Content: you should send white earphones with it but i sure do love this phone please send ear phones and a better charger

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product  This Product is the same as i hope. i am very happy with the product I will  recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Victor Ferreri
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product  This Product is the same as i hope. i am very happy with the product I will  recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Kabbashi
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and liked it very much. She calls it the little machine that can do. It is user friendly with highest usability features for the price.

Reviews.Title: so/so
Reviews.Author: Sukisuki
Reviews.Content: the phone seems great but it freezes alot, and it is hard to hang up a call or switch if you have an incoming call.
